about_the_game:
Two magical girls discover a latent power within you... and now they want to steal magic energy from you to use for their own selfish purposes.



The pure-hearted heroine will destroy evil... when it's convenient for her. She puts on a show for fans and supporters, but secretly cares only about her growing popularity, and is willing to commit all kinds of vile crimes to remain famous.






This wicked and selfish villainess doesn't care about her reputation so long as she gets her way! Kidnapping, grand theft, and even murder?! She'll do it all to further her selfish goals!





These two girls fight over your "love", draining your latent magic out of you with their tempting bodies, all with the aim of turning you into their toy, and a dehumanized tool to fight each other for dominance and rule the city as the victor...






But as they torment you, a seed of burning hatred grows inside you. The greedy pair of magical girls will be the target of your revenge vengeance, and they will be punished for their evil deeds!

The magic inside you will help enact sweet, sexy justice! Those who mistreated you will fall from grace, be forced to obey your every whim, and gradually lose the will to resist.






This is a tale of abuse, betrayal, and retribution. A chronicle of loveless sex in a struggle for power and control. A story about mating with magical girls.

Features:

  • A lengthy visual novel experience, featuring 30+ animated CGs!
  • Engage with the story to make an impact! Make choices, fight in turn-based combat, and present evidence to win arguments! Find your way to all the endings!
  • Treat your ears to full English voice acting, and an original soundtrack!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features non-consensual sex, mind control, impregnation, tentacles, and more. Player discretion is advised.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Mahou Mating

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Punish the naughty magical girls! Get revenge on two sexy villainesses and turn them into your personal sex toys in this fully-voiced erotic visual novel!
